mapper.insert: INSERT INTO YOUTUBE ( YT_NO, YT_WRITE_DATE, YT_DELETE_DATE, YT_POST_DATE, YT_END_DATE, MEMBER_NO, YT_PATH, YT_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_YT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ytWriteDate}, #{ytDeleteDate}, #{ytPostDate}, #{ytEndDate}, 1, #{ytPath}, #{ytName} )
mapper.select: SELECT YT_NO, YT_WRTIE_DATE, YT_DELETE_DATE, YT_POST_DATE, YT_END_DATE, MEMBER_NO, YT_PATH, YT_NAME FROM YOUTUBE JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = 1;
